    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Handedness Handedness.fromSign​(float v)
    Converts a single precision sign to a handedness enumeration.
    static Handedness Handedness.fromSign​(int v)
    Converts an integer sign to a handedness enumeration.
    static Handedness Handedness.reverse​(Handedness h)
    Returns the opposite of the input handedness.
    static Handedness Handedness.valueOf​(java.lang.String name)
    Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
    static Handedness[] Handedness.values()
    Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
    Methods in camzup.core with parameters of type Handedness 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Mat4 Mat4.camera​(Vec3 loc, Vec3 focus, Vec3 ref, Handedness handedness, Mat4 target, Vec3 i, Vec3 j, Vec3 k)
    Generates an orbiting camera matrix.
    static Mat4 Mat4.cameraDimetric​(Vec3 loc, Handedness handedness, Mat4 target)
    Creates an pseudo-isometric camera suitable to pixel art, with a rise of 1 pixel and a run of 2 pixels.
    static Transform2 Curve2.evalFirst​(Curve2 curve, Handedness handedness, Transform2 target)
    Evaluates the first knot in the curve.
    static Transform3 Curve3.evalFirst​(Curve3 curve, Handedness handedness, Transform3 target)
    Evaluates the first knot in the curve.
    static Transform2 Curve2.evalLast​(Curve2 curve, Handedness handedness, Transform2 target)
    Evaluates the last knot in the curve.
    static Transform3 Curve3.evalLast​(Curve3 curve, Handedness handedness, Transform3 target)
    Evaluates the last knot in the curve.

    Creates a quaternion from a direction given a handedness.
    static Quaternion Quaternion.fromDir​(Vec3 dir, Handedness handedness, Quaternion target, Vec3 right, Vec3 forward, Vec3 up)
    Creates a quaternion from a direction.
    static Transform2 Transform2.fromDir​(Ray2 ray, Handedness handedness, Transform2 target)
    Creates a transform from a ray.
    static Transform2 Transform2.fromDir​(Vec2 dir, Handedness handedness, Transform2 target)

    static Transform3 Transform3.fromDir​(Ray3 ray, Handedness handedness, Transform3 target)
    Creates a transform from a ray.
    static Transform3 Transform3.fromDir​(Vec3 dir, Handedness handedness, Transform3 target)
    Creates a transform from a direction.
    Entity3 Entity3.lookAt​(Vec3 point, float step, Handedness handedness)
    Orients the entity to look at a target point.
    Transform2 Transform2.lookAt​(Vec2 point, float step, Handedness handedness)
    Orients the transform to look at a target point.
    Transform3 Transform3.lookAt​(Vec3 point, float step, Handedness handedness)
    Orients the transform to look at a target point.

    The transform eases toward the look at rotation because discontinuities arise with using a look at matrix when a transform's look direction is parallel with the world up axis.
    Entity3 Entity3.lookIn​(Vec3 dir, float step, Handedness handedness)
    Orients the entity to look in a direction.
    Transform3 Transform3.lookIn​(Vec3 dir, float step, Handedness handedness)
    Orients the transform to look toward a direction.

    The transform eases toward the look at rotation because discontinuities arise with using a look at matrix when a transform's look direction is parallel with the world up axis.
    static Quaternion Face3.orientation​(Face3 face, Handedness handedness, Quaternion target)
    Returns the orientation of the vertex as a quaternion based on the face's normal.
    static Transform3 Face3.orientation​(Face3 face, Handedness handedness, Transform3 target)
    Returns the orientation of the vertex as a transform based on the face's normal.
    static Quaternion Vert3.orientation​(Vert3 vert, Handedness handedness, Quaternion target)
    Returns the orientation of the vertex as a quaternion based on the vertex's normal.
    static Transform3 Vert3.orientation​(Vert3 vert, Handedness handedness, Transform3 target)
    Returns the orientation of the vertex as a transform based on the vertex's normal.
    static Handedness Handedness.reverse​(Handedness h)
    Returns the opposite of the input handedness.
    Face3 Face3.translateLocal​(Vec3 v, Handedness handedness)
    Translates the face in local space.
